title: Our friends, why?
creator_credit: R. Dudfield, J. Biss and Brighton Grammar School (Vic.). Film Makers Club
brief_description: The story revolves around two brothers, their friends and a broken kite. When the friends find out they have been hoaxed by the brothers, there is a rumpus, but finally all shake hands and are friends again. (Award: Best film of all categories at the 1963 Milan International Festival for Young Film Makers)
